name: Blocks (itch) (n3v3r001)
description:
Blocks - the entertaining and relaxing game with an addictive factor!

Bring the blocks in horizontal or vertical rows so that they dissolve.
Ideal for in between! Whether in the office, at university or during lunch break.

◉ No advertising!
◉ Also works offline
◉ Without music or sound (perfect for work, university or lunch break)
◉ You can share your high score with friends
◉ Now with Google Play Leaderboard! Compare your highscore with friends!
